name: diya-sdk
description: SDK for accessing Diya One services

scripts.build-debug: browserify src/diya-sdk.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 ] ] --exclude q --im -d --s d1 > build/diya-sdk.js
scripts.build-min: browserify src/diya-sdk.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 es2016 ] ] --exclude q --im --s d1 | uglifyjs -c > build/diya-sdk.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Sylvain Mah√© <sylv.mahe@gmail.com> (https://github.com/nilpotence)
